title: Lands' End CEO Says Asia Getting Back to Work
itunes:title: Lands' End CEO Says Asia Getting Back to Work
description:
Lands’ End CEO Jerome Griffith discusses how the coronavirus is impacting the retail industry. He explains that many of his employees based in Asia are back on the job, and that there have been very few issues with their supply chain.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
